mapper.select: SELECT s.order_no, order_detail_no, vend_nm, pro_nm, order_cnt, parrd_dt FROM order_sheet s, order_detail d WHERE s.order_no = d.order_no AND order_sit_detail = '준비중' ORDER BY parrd_dt

SELECT pro_cd, pro_lot_no, lot_cnt, (SELECT pro_nm FROM edcts WHERE pro_cd = p.pro_cd ) AS "pro_nm" , pro_exp, pro_wdt FROM pro_stc p WHERE (SELECT pro_nm FROM edcts WHERE pro_cd = p.pro_cd )=#{proNm} AND TO_CHAR(pro_exp,'yyyyMMdd') >= TO_CHAR((sysdate+5),'yyyyMMdd') GROUP BY pro_ist_no,pro_cd,pro_lot_no,lot_cnt,pro_exp, pro_wdt
